title: Getting Rid Of Your Mortgage Will Accelerate The Rest Of You Financial Goals! (Hour 2)
description:
Rachel Cruze & George Kamel discuss:

Why the Debt Snowball is designed to help you succeed with paying off debt quickly,

How paying off your house during retirement gives you even more freedom,

What to do when your lease is up on a vehicle,

How managing your expectations are important when it comes to home buying,

When you can switch from Gazelle Intense savings to intentional investing,

Why paying off your house as soon possible is the best set up for success.


Support Our Sponsor:

Zander Insurance

Grip6


Gazelle – Terms & Conditions Apply. Visit www.ramseysolutions.com/gazelle for more information. Established by Pathward, N.A., Member FDIC.
